TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MutexSecurity extends System.Security.AccessControl.NativeObjectSecurity
Public NotInheritable Class MutexSecurity Inherits NativeObjectSecurity

summary.span: 表示命名的 mutex 的 Windows 访问控制安全性。

span.span: Represents the Windows access control security for a named mutex.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象指定的命名的系统 mutex 的访问权限以及如何审核访问尝试。A object specifies access rights for a named system mutex, and also specifies how access attempts are audited. 互斥体的访问权限表示为规则，由表示每个访问规则对象。Access rights to the mutex are expressed as rules, with each access rule represented by a object. 每个审核规则由对象。Each auditing rule is represented by a object. 这反映了基础的 Windows 安全系统，其中每个安全对象具有最多有一个自定义访问控制列表 (DACL) 控制对受保护的对象，并最多指定的访问权限的一个系统访问控制列表 (SACL) 访问尝试进行审核。This mirrors the underlying Windows security system, in which each securable object has at most one discretionary access control list (DACL) that controls access to the secured object, and at most one system access control list (SACL) that specifies which access attempts are audited. DACL 和 SACL 进行排序的访问控制项 (ACE) 指定的访问和审核用户和组的列表。The DACL and SACL are ordered lists of access control entries (ACE) that specify access and auditing for users and groups. 一个或对象可以表示多个 ACE。A or object might represent more than one ACE. > [!NOTE] > 一个对象可以表示了局部互斥体或命名的系统互斥体。A object can represent a local mutex or a named system mutex. Windows 访问控制安全性是仅对已命名的系统互斥体，有意义。Windows access control security is meaningful only for named system mutexes. ， ，和类隐藏的 Acl 和 Ace 的实现详细信息。The , , and classes hide the implementation details of ACLs and ACEs. 它们允许您忽略十七个不同的 ACE 类型和继承和传播的访问权限进行正确维护的复杂性。They allow you to ignore the seventeen different ACE types and the complexity of correctly maintaining inheritance and propagation of access rights. 这些对象还旨在阻止以下常见的访问控制错误：These objects are also designed to prevent the following common access control errors: - 创建具有 null DACL 的安全描述符。Creating a security descriptor with a null DACL. 对 DACL 的 null 引用允许任何用户将访问规则添加到一个对象，可能会创建拒绝服务攻击。A null reference to a DACL allows any user to add access rules to an object, potentially creating a denial-of-service attack. 一个新对象开始时始终使用空的 DACL，此操作会拒绝所有用户的所有访问权限。A new object always starts with an empty DACL, which denies all access for all users. - 违反 Ace 的规范顺序。Violating the canonical ordering of ACEs. 如果 DACL 中的 ACE 列表不会保存在规范顺序，用户可能会无意中被赋予访问受保护的对象。If the ACE list in the DACL is not kept in the canonical order, users might inadvertently be given access to the secured object. 例如，被拒绝的访问权限必须始终出现在允许的访问权限之前。For example, denied access rights must always appear before allowed access rights. 对象在内部维护正确的顺序。 objects maintain the correct order internally. - 操作应仅资源管理器控制下的安全描述符标志。Manipulating security descriptor flags, which should be under resource manager control only. - 正在创建无效的 ACE 标志组合。Creating invalid combinations of ACE flags. - 处理继承的 Ace。Manipulating inherited ACEs. 继承和传播由资源管理器，以响应对访问和审核规则所做的更改处理。Inheritance and propagation are handled by the resource manager, in response to changes you make to access and audit rules. - 将无意义的 Ace 插入到 Acl。Inserting meaningless ACEs into ACLs. 不支持的.NET 安全对象的唯一功能是危险的活动，应避免使用由大多数应用程序开发人员，如下所示：The only capabilities not supported by the .NET security objects are dangerous activities that should be avoided by the majority of application developers, such as the following: - 通常由资源管理器执行的低级别任务。Low-level tasks that are normally performed by the resource manager. - 添加或删除访问控制项中不维护规范排序的方式。Adding or removing access control entries in ways that do not maintain the canonical ordering. 若要修改某个命名的 mutex 的 Windows 访问控制安全性，请使用方法以获取对象。To modify Windows access control security for a named mutex, use the method to get the object. 通过添加和删除规则，修改安全对象，然后使用方法以将其重新附加。Modify the security object by adding and removing rules, and then use the method to reattach it. > [!IMPORTANT] > 对所做的更改对象并不会影响已命名的 mutex 的访问级别，直到你调用方法以将修改过的安全对象分配到命名互斥体。Changes you make to a object do not affect the access levels of the named mutex until you call the method to assign the altered security object to the named mutex. 若要将访问控制安全性复制到另一个互斥锁，请使用方法以获取表示第一个互斥体的访问和审核规则的对象，然后使用方法或构造函数接受对象，将这些规则分配给第二个互斥体。To copy access control security from one mutex to another, use the method to get a object representing the access and audit rules for the first mutex, and then use the method, or a constructor that accepts a object, to assign those rules to the second mutex. 安全描述符定义语言 (SDDL) 投资的用户可以使用方法来设置命名的 mutex 的访问规则和方法来获取一个字符串，表示访问规则的 SDDL 格式。Users with an investment in the security descriptor definition language (SDDL) can use the method to set access rules for a named mutex, and the method to obtain a string that represents the access rules in SDDL format. 这不被建议用于新开发。This is not recommended for new development. > [!NOTE] > Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 不支持同步对象的安全性。Security on synchronization objects is not supported for Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了之间的分离规则和规则，并在兼容的规则中显示的权限的组合。The following code example demonstrates the separation between rules and rules, and shows the combination of rights in compatible rules. 此示例将创建对象，添加规则，允许和拒绝具有各种权限的当前用户，并显示最终的规则对。The example creates a object, adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user, and displays the resulting pair of rules. 然后可对当前用户的新权限，并显示结果，显示新权限将与现有合并规则。The example then allows new rights for the current user and displays the result, showing that the new rights are merged with the existing rule. > [!NOTE] > 此示例不会附加到的安全对象对象。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 附加安全对象的示例可在和。Examples that attach security objects can be found in and . [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.AddAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.AddAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个新对象开始时始终具有空的自由访问控制列表 (DACL)，此操作会拒绝所有用户的所有访问权限。A new object always starts with an empty discretionary access list (DACL), which denies all access for all users.

Public Sub New (name As String, includeSections As AccessControlSections)

param.name: name
param.span: 要检索其访问控制安全性规则的系统 mutex 的名称。

span.span: The name of the system mutex whose access control security rules are to be retrieved.

param.span: 指定要检索的部分的 标志的组合。

summary.span: 使用来自具有指定名称的系统 mutex 的访问控制安全性规则的指定部分初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified sections of the access control security rules from the system mutex with the specified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数，可获得的命名的系统互斥体的访问控制安全性，而不必先创建对象。This constructor allows you to obtain the access control security for a named system mutex without first creating a object. 使用已命名的系统对象时必须谨慎。Caution must be exercised when working with named system objects. 如果没有名为系统对象`name`的不是互斥体，可能会检索其访问控制安全性。If there is a system object named `name` that is not a mutex, its control access security might be retrieved.

exception.span: 没有具有指定名称的系统对象。

span.span: There is no system object with the specified name.

exception.span: Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 不支持此类。

span.span: This class is not supported on Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition.

summary.span: 获取 类用于表示访问规则的枚举。

span.span: Gets the enumeration that the class uses to represent access rights.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示 枚举。

span.span: A object representing the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的类类重写属性，并返回它们用于表示访问权限的类型。Classes that derive from the class override the property and return the type they use to represent access rights. 数组或包含多个类型的安全对象的集合时，使用此属性来确定要使用每个安全对象的正确的枚举类型。When you work with arrays or collections that contain multiple types of security objects, use this property to determine the correct enumeration type to use with each security object.

summary.span: 使用指定的访问权限、访问控制和标志为指定用户创建新的访问控制规则。

span.span: Creates a new access control rule for the specified user, with the specified access rights, access control, and flags.

returns.span: 一个 对象，表示指定用户的指定权限。

span.span: A object representing the specified rights for the specified user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建访问控制规则的建议的方法是使用的构造函数类。The recommended way to create access control rules is to use the constructors of the class. > [!NOTE] > 尽管继承和传播标志这对于命名的 mutex 没有意义，但就仍然可以指定它们。Although inheritance and propagation flags are meaningless for named mutexes, it is still possible to specify them. 这不是建议，因为它不必要地增加复杂性维护的规则，例如通过干扰本来可以兼容的规则组合起来。This is not recommended, because it needlessly complicates the maintenance of rules, for example by interfering with the combination of rules that would otherwise be compatible.

span.span: Searches for a matching access control rule with which the new rule can be merged.

summary.span: 如果未找到符合条件的规则，则添加新规则。

span.span: If none are found, adds the new rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法搜索与同一用户或组和相同的规则作为`rule`。The method searches for rules with the same user or group and the same as `rule`. 如果找不到，`rule`添加。If none are found, `rule` is added. 如果找到匹配规则是中的权限`rule`与现有规则合并。If a matching rule is found, the rights in `rule` are merged with the existing rule. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了之间的分离规则和规则，并在兼容的规则中显示的权限的组合。The following code example demonstrates the separation between rules and rules, and shows the combination of rights in compatible rules. 此示例将创建对象，添加规则，允许和拒绝具有各种权限的当前用户，并显示最终的规则对。The example creates a object, adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user, and displays the resulting pair of rules. 然后可对当前用户的新权限，并显示结果，显示新权限将与现有合并规则。The example then allows new rights for the current user and displays the result, showing that the new rights are merged with the existing rule. > [!NOTE] > 此示例不会附加到的安全对象对象。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 附加安全对象的示例可在 。Examples that attach security objects can be found in . [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.AddAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.AddAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法搜索的规则具有相同的用户或组作为`rule`。The method searches for rules with the same user or group as `rule`. 如果找不到，`rule`添加。If none are found, `rule` is added. 如果找到匹配规则是中的标志`rule`合并到现有规则。If a matching rule is found, the flags in `rule` are merged into the existing rule.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool RemoveAccessRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.MutexAccessRule rule) cil managed
Public Function RemoveAccessRule (rule As MutexAccessRule) As Boolean

param.name: rule
param.span: 指定要搜索的用户和 的 ，以及匹配规则（如果找到）必须兼容的一组继承和传播标志。

span.span: A that specifies the user and to search for, and a set of inheritance and propagation flags that a matching rule, if found, must be compatible with.

param.span: 指定要从兼容规则移除的权限（如果找到）。

span.span: Specifies the rights to remove from the compatible rule, if found.

summary.span: 搜索如下的访问控制规则：与指定的访问规则具有相同的用户和 （允许或拒绝），并具有兼容的继承和传播标志；如果找到，则从中移除指定访问规则中包含的权限。

span.span: Searches for an access control rule with the same user and (allow or deny) as the specified rule, and with compatible inheritance and propagation flags; if such a rule is found, the rights contained in the specified access rule are removed from it.

returns.span: 如果找到一个兼容规则，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a compatible rule is found; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前具有相同的用户以及相同的规则中搜索值作为`rule`。The current is searched for a rule that has the same user and the same value as `rule`. 如果找到任何此类规则，不执行任何操作，并且该方法返回`false`。If no such rule is found, no action is taken, and the method returns `false`. 如果找到匹配规则，将检查其继承和兼容性标志是否与中指定的标志的兼容性`rule`。If matching rules are found, their inheritance and compatibility flags are checked for compatibility with the flags specified in `rule`. 如果找到不兼容的规则，不执行任何操作，并且该方法返回`false`。If no compatible rule is found, no action is taken, and the method returns `false`. 如果找到具有兼容的标志的规则，则在指定的权限`rule`删除从兼容规则，并且该方法返回`true`。If a rule with compatible flags is found, the rights specified in `rule` are removed from the compatible rule, and the method returns `true`. 如果`rule`指定不兼容的规则中包含的权限，根据这些权限不执行任何操作。If `rule` specifies rights not contained in the compatible rule, no action is taken with respect to those rights. 如果从兼容规则移除的所有权限，整个规则都已从当前对象。If all rights are removed from the compatible rule, the entire rule is removed from the current object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 虽然可以通过创建使用指定的互斥体的访问规则的继承和传播标志，这不推荐使用方法。Although you can specify inheritance and propagation flags for mutex access rules, by creating them with the method, this is not recommended. 继承和传播对命名的 mutex 没有意义并且它们使得访问规则的维护更复杂。Inheritance and propagation have no meaning for named mutexes, and they make the maintenance of access rules more complicated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法删除的权限中的规则对象。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to remove rights from an rule in a object. 它还演示了中的其他权限`rule`将被忽略。It also shows that other rights in `rule` are ignored. 此示例将创建对象，并添加允许和拒绝为当前用户的各种权限的规则。The example creates a object and adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user. 允许的权限包括， ，和。The rights allowed include , , and . 然后，示例创建的新规则的当前用户，包括并权限，并将该规则用于方法来删除从中的规则对象。The example then creates a new rule for the current user, including and rights, and uses that rule with the method to remove from the rule in the object. 无关在中直接`rule`将被忽略。The extraneous right in `rule` is ignored. > [!NOTE] > 此示例不会附加到的安全对象对象。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 附加安全对象的示例可在和。Examples that attach security objects can be found in and . [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.RemoveAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.RemoveAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.RemoveAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.RemoveAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 搜索与指定的规则具有相同用户和 （允许或拒绝）的所有访问控制规则，如果找到则将其移除。

span.span: Searches for all access control rules with the same user and (allow or deny) as the specified rule and, if found, removes them.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前对象中搜索具有相同的用户以及相同的规则值作为`rule`。The current object is searched for rules that have the same user and the same value as `rule`. 指定的任何权限`rule`时执行此搜索，将忽略。Any rights specified by `rule` are ignored when performing this search. 如果不找到任何匹配的规则，不执行任何操作。If no matching rules are found, no action is taken. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法中删除所有与用户匹配的规则和，忽略权限。The following code example shows that the method removes all rules that match user and , ignoring rights. 此示例将创建对象，添加规则，允许和拒绝具有各种权限的当前用户，然后将合并到更多权限规则。The example creates a object, adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user, and then merges additional rights into the rule. 该示例然后创建新的规则，允许当前用户取得所有权，并使用该规则来删除规则从对象。The example then creates a new rule that allows the current user to take ownership, and uses that rule to remove the rule from the object. > [!NOTE] > 此示例不会附加到的安全对象对象。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 附加安全对象的示例可在和。Examples that attach security objects can be found in and . [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.RemoveAccessRuleAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.RemoveAccessRuleAll/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.RemoveAccessRuleAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.RemoveAccessRuleAll/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveAccessRuleSpecific(class System.Security.AccessControl.MutexAccessRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 要移除的 。

span.span: The to remove.

summary.span: 搜索与指定的规则完全匹配的访问控制规则，如果找到则将其移除。

span.span: Searches for an access control rule that exactly matches the specified rule and, if found, removes it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当完全匹配时移除规则`rule`中的所有详细信息，包括标志。The rule is removed only if it exactly matches `rule` in all details, including flags. 其他规则具有相同的用户和不会受到影响。Other rules with the same user and are not affected. > [!IMPORTANT] > 一个规则表示一个或多个基础访问控制项 (ACE)，这些条目拆分或组合根据需要修改用户的访问安全性规则时。A rule represents one or more underlying access control entries (ACE), and these entries are split or combined as necessary when you modify the access security rules for a user. 因此，存在的规则可能无法再在特定窗体时添加，并在这种情况下方法不能删除它。Thus, a rule might no longer exist in the specific form it had when it was added, and in that case the method cannot remove it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法需要完全匹配才能删除的规则和规则来允许和拒绝权限是相互独立。The following code example shows that the method requires an exact match in order to remove a rule, and that rules to allow and deny rights are independent of each other. 此示例将创建对象，添加规则，允许和拒绝具有各种权限的当前用户，然后将合并到更多权限访问规则。The example creates a object, adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user, and then merges additional rights into the access rule. 该示例然后将原始规则方法，并显示结果，其中显示任何内容，并被删除。The example then passes the original rule to the method, and displays the results, showing that nothing is deleted. 然后，该示例将构造匹配的规则中的规则对象，并已成功使用方法来删除该规则。The example then constructs a rule that matches the rule in the object, and successfully uses the method to remove the rule. > [!NOTE] > 此示例不会附加到的安全对象对象。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 附加安全对象的示例可在和。Examples that attach security objects can be found in and . [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.RemoveAccessRuleSpecific#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.RemoveAccessRuleSpecific/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.RemoveAccessRuleSpecific#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.RemoveAccessRuleSpecific/VB/source.vb#1)]

returns.span: 如果找到一个兼容规则，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前搜索的审核规则具有相同用户作为`rule`。The current is searched for an audit rule that has the same user as `rule`. 如果找到任何此类规则，不执行任何操作，并且该方法返回`false`。If no such rule is found, no action is taken, and the method returns `false`. 如果找到匹配规则，将检查其继承和兼容性标志是否与中指定的标志的兼容性`rule`。If matching rules are found, their inheritance and compatibility flags are checked for compatibility with the flags specified in `rule`. 如果找到不兼容的规则，不执行任何操作，并且该方法返回`false`。If no compatible rule is found, no action is taken, and the method returns `false`. 如果找到具有兼容的标志的规则，则在指定的权限`rule`删除从兼容规则，并且该方法返回`true`。If a rule with compatible flags is found, the rights specified in `rule` are removed from the compatible rule, and the method returns `true`. 如果`rule`指定不兼容的规则中包含的权限，根据这些权限不执行任何操作。If `rule` specifies rights not contained in the compatible rule, no action is taken with respect to those rights. 如果从兼容规则移除的所有权限，整个规则都已从当前对象。If all rights are removed from the compatible rule, the entire rule is removed from the current object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 虽然可以通过创建与指定互斥体的审核规则的继承和传播标志，这不推荐使用方法。Although you can specify inheritance and propagation flags for mutex audit rules, by creating them with the method, this is not recommended. 继承和传播对命名的 mutex 没有意义并且它们使得审核规则的维护更复杂。Inheritance and propagation have no meaning for named mutexes, and they make the maintenance of audit rules more complicated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前搜索的审核规则具有相同用户作为`rule`。The current is searched for audit rules that have the same user as `rule`. 指定的任何权限`rule`时执行此搜索，将忽略。Any rights specified by `rule` are ignored when performing this search. 删除所有匹配规则。All matching rules are removed. 如果不找到任何匹配的规则，不执行任何操作。If no matching rules are found, no action is taken.

summary.span: 搜索与指定的规则完全匹配的审核规则；如果找到，则移除这些规则。

span.span: Searches for an audit rule that exactly matches the specified rule and, if found, removes it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当完全匹配时移除规则`rule`中的所有详细信息，包括标志。The rule is removed only if it exactly matches `rule` in all details, including flags. 不会影响同一个用户的其他审核规则。Other audit rules for the same user are not affected. > [!IMPORTANT] > 一个规则表示一个或多个基础访问控制项 (ACE)，这些条目拆分或组合根据需要修改用户的审核安全规则时。A rule represents one or more underlying access control entries (ACE), and these entries are split or combined as necessary when you modify the audit security rules for a user. 因此，存在的规则可能无法再在特定窗体时添加，并在这种情况下方法不能删除它。Thus, a rule might no longer exist in the specific form it had when it was added, and in that case the method cannot remove it.

span.span: The user specified by this rule determines the rules to remove before this rule is added.

summary.span: 不论 如何，移除与指定的规则具有相同用户的所有访问控制规则，然后添加指定的规则。

span.span: Removes all access control rules with the same user as the specified rule, regardless of , and then adds the specified rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有与指定的规则匹配的用户的访问规则`rule`添加。If there are no access rules whose user matches the specified rule, `rule` is added. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法会替换为匹配指定的规则匹配的用户的所有规则。The following code example shows how the method replaces all rules for the matching user with the rule specified for the match. 此示例将创建对象，并添加允许和拒绝为当前用户的各种权限的规则。The example creates a object and adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user. 该示例然后创建新的规则，允许当前的用户完全控制，并使用方法将这两个现有规则替换为新的规则。The example then creates a new rule that allows the current user full control, and uses the method to replace both of the existing rules with the new rule. > [!NOTE] > 此示例不会附加到的安全对象对象。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 附加安全对象的示例可在和。Examples that attach security objects can be found in and . [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.ResetAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.ResetAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.ResetAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.ResetAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Removes all access control rules with the same user and (allow or deny) as the specified rule, and then adds the specified rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的规则具有，此方法的效果是删除所有为指定的用户，它们替换为指定的规则的规则。If the specified rule has , the effect of this method is to remove all rules for the specified user, replacing them with the specified rule. 如果指定的规则具有，则所有规则指定的用户将替换为指定的规则。If the specified rule has , all rules for the specified user are replaced with the specified rule. 如果没有规则的用户和匹配指定的规则`rule`添加。If there are no rules whose user and match the specified rule, `rule` is added. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何方法移除匹配这两个用户的所有规则和的`rule`，将它们替换为`rule`。The following code example shows how the method removes all rules that match both the user and the of `rule`, replacing them with `rule`. 此示例将创建对象，并添加允许和拒绝为当前用户的各种权限的规则。The example creates a object and adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user. 该示例然后创建新的规则，允许当前的用户完全控制，并使用替换现有的方法允许使用新规则的规则。The example then creates a new rule that allows the current user full control, and uses the method to replace the existing Allow rule with the new rule. 拒绝访问的规则不受影响。The rule that denies access is not affected. > [!NOTE] > 此示例不会附加到的安全对象对象。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 附加安全对象的示例可在和。Examples that attach security objects can be found in and . [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.SetAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.SetAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.SetAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.SetAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)]
